final_answer.explanation: To determine the youngest American runner in the 2010 Chicago Marathon, we first identified the American participants and their birthdates. The two American runners listed are: 1. Jason Hartmann, born March 23, 1981, and 2. Mike Sayenko, born July 12, 1984. We calculated their ages on the marathon date, October 10, 2010. Jason Hartmann was 29 years old, while Mike Sayenko was 26 years old. This confirms that Mike Sayenko is the youngest American runner in the marathon, being 3 years younger than Jason Hartmann. The ages have been verified against reliable sources, ensuring the accuracy of the birthdates and resulting ages.
final_answer.answer: Mike Sayenko is the youngest American runner in the 2010 Chicago Marathon.
